content: it s a spring fling by carroll davis-johnson fling on this easy shawl and you re ready for the spring weather instructions cast on 3 stitches setup row kfb kfb kfb 6 stitches garter section mark right side with locking stitch marker materials row 1 rs k1 yo kfb knit until 2 stitches remain kfb yo k1 increase of 4 stitches needle us 5 32 circular needle row 2 ws knit yarn zauberball cotton 462 yards 100g repeat garter section for 28 more row until you count 15 garter ridges shown in color 2341 when looking at the wrong side one garter ridge equals two knit row notions locking stitch marker to mark work eyelet section once the right side of knitting & darning needle eyelet section row 1 rs k1 yo kfb *yo k2tog repeat from * until 2 stitches size 72 long x 10 deep remain kfb yo k1 row 2 ws knit gauge 18 stitches in garter stitch = 4 work the garter section for 16 row total then work the eyelet section once repeat this 18-row garter/eyelet sequence 4 more times abbreviations feel free to modify with more garter row or more eyelet row it s your spring fling edging work garter section twice then work eyelet section once kfb = knit in front and back of one stitch repeat the edging sequence 2 more times yo = yarn over picot bind off rs = right side with right side facing cast on two new stiches to left needle using knitted ws = wrong side cast on next knit the two new stitches then lift the right stitch over the left k2tog = knit next two stitches together in a traditional bind off repeat to bind off four stitches after the fourth knitted cast on = knit into the first bind off place the remaining stitch on right needle back to left needle stitch on left needle but do not slip it off the repeat by casting on 2 new stitches again and binding off
